letter.content:
Even superheroes fall in love‚Ä¶

And somehow, you became my favorite part of every day.

I didn't plan it.
I didn't expect it.

But I'm grateful it happened.

You make ordinary moments feel extraordinary, and every adventure better just by being there.

With you, I found my greatest power ‚Äî love.

memories.caption: When you made me laugh so hard

reasons.title: Your Smile
reasons.description: It lights up my entire universe

reasons.title: Your Laugh
reasons.description: The most beautiful sound I know

reasons.title: Your Kindness
reasons.description: You make the world better just by existing

reasons.title: Your Courage
reasons.description: You inspire me to be braver

reasons.title: Your Heart
reasons.description: So big, so warm, so full of love

finalMessage.question: Will you be my forever hero?
